TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until April 19
Mon to Fri, 10 AM to 3:30 PM
[W] Service is replaced by [N] trains between 57 St-7 Av in Manhattan and Ditmars Blvd in Queens
[W] Trains run every 20 minutes in Manhattan


[W] Trains run between Whitehall St and 57 St-7 Av, and via the [Q] to/from 96 St.

• Transfer between [N]* and [W] trains at Times Sq-42 St (across the platform).

*Manhattan-bound [N] service only between Ditmars Blvd and Queensboro Plaza.

Alternate travel note:
[R] service is also available at 5 Av/59 St and Lexington Av/59 St. Transfer between [R] and [W] trains at 57 St-7 Av.
